content.text: Match ends, Queens Park Rangers 0, Chelsea 1.
Second Half ends, Queens Park Rangers 0, Chelsea 1.
Attempt missed. Shaun Wright-Phillips (Queens Park Rangers) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt saved. Luke Young (Queens Park Rangers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jamie Mackie.
Offside, Chelsea. Raul Meireles tries a through ball, but Fernando Torres is caught offside.
Oriol Romeu (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Robert Hulse (Queens Park Rangers) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Chelsea).
Michael Essien (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Joey Barton (Queens Park Rangers).
Substitution, Chelsea. Michael Essien replaces Juan Mata.

Corner,  Queens Park Rangers. Conceded by Ashley Cole.
Substitution, Queens Park Rangers. Robert Hulse replaces Ákos Buzsáky.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Chelsea. Oriol Romeu replaces Ramires because of an injury.
